added.description: Increase the thread stack size to include space for glibc static thread-local storage (TLS) if true
added.name: AdjustStackSizeForTLS

added.description: (0) first map at preferred address, and if unsuccessful, map at alternative address (default); (1) always map at alternative address; (2) always map at preferred address, and if unsuccessful, do not map the archive
added.name: ArchiveRelocationMode

added.description: Compilation modes: default: normal tiered compilation; quick-only: C1-only mode; high-only: C2/JVMCI-only mode; high-only-quick-internal: C2/JVMCI-only mode, with JVMCI compiler compiled with C1.
added.name: CompilationMode

added.description: Allow JVMCI to be used in product mode. This alters a subset of JVMCI flags to be non-experimental, defaults UseJVMCICompiler and EnableJVMCI to true and defaults UseJVMCINativeLibrary to true if a JVMCI native library is available.
added.name: EnableJVMCIProduct

added.description: GC mode to use. Among other things, this defines which barriers are in in use. Possible values are: satb - snapshot-at-the-beginning concurrent GC (three pass mark-evac-update); iu - incremental-update concurrent GC (three pass mark-evac-update); passive - stop the world GC only (either degenerated or full)
added.name: ShenandoahGCMode

added.description: Static heap region size. Set zero to enable automatic sizing.
added.name: ShenandoahRegionSize

added.description: Fix references with load reference barrier. Disabling this might degrade performance.
added.name: ShenandoahSelfFixing

added.description: Show exception messages from RuntimeExceptions that contain snippets of the failing code. Disable this to improve privacy.
added.name: ShowCodeDetailsInExceptionMessages

added.description: Back edge threshold at which to switch to interpreter to profile if coming from AOT (applicable only with CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)
added.name: Tier0AOTBackEdgeThreshold

added.description: Threshold at which to switch to interpreter to profile if coming from AOT (invocation minimum must be satisfied, applicable only with CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)
added.name: Tier0AOTCompileThreshold

added.description: Switch to interpreter to profile if the number of method invocations crosses this threshold if coming from AOT (applicable only with CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)
added.name: Tier0AOTInvocationThreshold

added.description: Minimum number of invocations to switch to interpreter to profile if coming from AOT (applicable only with CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)
added.name: Tier0AOTMinInvocationThreshold

added.description: If C2 queue size grows over this amount per compiler thread do not start profiling in the interpreter (applicable only with CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)
added.name: Tier0Delay

added.description: Back edge threshold at which tier 4 OSR compilation is invoked (applicable only with CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)
added.name: Tier40BackEdgeThreshold

added.description: Threshold at which tier 4 compilation is invoked (invocation minimum must be satisfied, applicable only with CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)
added.name: Tier40CompileThreshold

added.description: Compile if number of method invocations crosses this threshold (applicable only with CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)
added.name: Tier40InvocationThreshold

added.description: Minimum number of invocations to compile at tier 4 (applicable only with CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)
added.name: Tier40MinInvocationThreshold
